name: Dungeon in Grid Puzzles
description:
This is a puzzle game using numbers. You can think carefully, because there is no time limit. Puzzles are created automatically, so each time you start a new game, a different puzzle is generated. You can enjoy it again and again, even after you have solved all the puzzles.

THE STORY

The Lady Hilde ran away from home, accompanied by an impromptu retinue. And what they found was a dubious dungeon where magic was enchanted. At the entrance of the dungeon, there was a man giving a warning. However, the Lady Hilde, who knows her skills, did not listen to the warning and dived into the dungeon. What kind of ending awaits them?

FEATURES

  • This is a puzzle game using numbers.
  • She can only move 3 squares ahead horizontally or vertically, or 2 squares ahead diagonally.
  • Monsters must be present at the destination of her.
  • The destination monster must be weaker than her.
  • She gets stronger by one, with each monster she defeats.
  • Once all monsters have been defeated, a staircase will appear that leads further down.
  • Conquer up to 30 underground floors!
